price: Wọ́n ń wí pé: “Kí ni kò jẹ́ kí àmì kan sọ̀kalẹ̀ fún un láti ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa rẹ̀?” Nítorí náà, sọ pé: “Ti Allāhu ni ìkọ̀kọ̀. Nítorí náà, ẹ máa retí. Dájúdájú èmi náà wà pẹ̀lú yín nínú àwọn olùretí.”
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۖ فَقُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡغَيۡبُ لِلَّهِ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُنتَظِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna lawlā unzila ʿalayhi āyatun min rabbihi faqul innamā al-ghaybu lillahi fa-intaẓirū innī maʿakum mina al-muntaẓirīna
